nodes.short_description:
Devenez le mage ultime et lancez plus de 200 sorts puissants dans des combats en temps réel !

Personnalisez votre style de jeu avec plus de 70 compétences uniques et équipements complémentaires.

Affrontez plus de 100 ennemis distincts, chacun exigeant une stratégie différente pour atteindre la victoire.

Triomphez à travers 16 niveaux épiques et 15 défis palpitants.

Plongez dans cette aventure fantastique épique et transformez-vous en le sorcier que vous étiez destiné à être !

"Diventa il mago supremo e lancia oltre 200 potenti incantesimi in combattimenti in tempo reale!

Personalizza il tuo stile di gioco con più di 70 abilità uniche e pezzi di equipaggiamento aggiuntivi.

Affronta oltre 100 nemici distinti, ognuno con una strategia diversa per la vittoria.

Trionfa attraverso 16 livelli epici e 15 sfide emozionanti.

Immergiti in questa avventura fantasy epica e trasforma nel mago che eri destinato a diventare!

Word de ultieme magiër en werp meer dan 200 krachtige spreuken tijdens gevechten in real-time!

Pas je speelstijl aan met meer dan 70 unieke vaardigheden en uitrustingsstukken.

Trotseer meer dan 100 verschillende vijanden, elk met een andere strategie voor de overwinning.

Zegevier door 16 epische niveaus en 15 spannende uitdagingen.

Duik in dit epische fantasy-avontuur en word de tovenaar die je voorbestemd was te zijn!

Torne-se o mago supremo e lance mais de 200 feitiços poderosos em combates em tempo real!

Personalize seu estilo de jogo com mais de 70 habilidades únicas e equipamentos adicionais.

Enfrente mais de 100 inimigos distintos, cada um exigindo uma estratégia diferente para a vitória.

Vença 16 níveis épicos e 15 desafios emocionantes.

Mergulhe nesta aventura de fantasia épica e transforme-se no mago que você estava destinado a ser!

Conviértete en el mago supremo y lanza más de 200 poderosos hechizos en combates en tiempo real.

Personaliza tu estilo de juego con más de 70 habilidades y piezas de equipo únicas adicionales.

Enfréntate a más de 100 enemigos diferentes, cada uno requiriendo una estrategia distinta para la victoria.

Triunfa a lo largo de 16 niveles épicos y 15 desafíos emocionantes.

Sumérgete en esta épica aventura de fantasía y transfórmate en el mago que estabas destinado a ser.

Become the ultimate mage and cast over 200 powerful spells in real-time combat!

Customize your playstyle with more than 70 additional unique skills and pieces of equipment.

Face over 100 distinct enemies, each demanding a different strategy for victory.

Advanced physics engine makes every spell feel satisfying and immersive.

Triumph through 16 epic levels and 15 thrilling challenges.

Dive into this epic fantasy adventure and transform into the wizard you were destined to be!

Werde der ultimative Magier und wirke über 200 mächtige Zauber in spannenden Echtzeitkämpfen!

Passe deinen Spielstil mit über 70 einzigartigen Fähigkeiten und Ausrüstungsgegenständen an.

Stelle dich über 100 unterschiedlichen Feinden, die alle eine andere Strategie erfordern, um besiegt zu werden.

Bezwinge 16 epische Level und 15 spannende Herausforderungen.

Tauche ein in dieses epische Fantasy-Abenteuer und verwandle dich in den Zauberer, der du immer sein solltest!

Torne-se o mago supremo e lance mais de 200 feitiços poderosos em combates em tempo real!

Personalize seu estilo de jogo com mais de 70 habilidades únicas e equipamentos adicionais.

Enfrente mais de 100 inimigos distintos, cada um exigindo uma estratégia diferente para a vitória.

Vença 16 níveis épicos e 15 desafios emocionantes.

Mergulhe nesta aventura de fantasia épica e transforme-se no mago que você estava destinado a ser!

Conviértete en el mago supremo y lanza más de 200 poderosos hechizos en combates en tiempo real.

Personaliza tu estilo de juego con más de 70 habilidades y piezas de equipo únicas adicionales.

Enfréntate a más de 100 enemigos diferentes, cada uno requiriendo una estrategia distinta para la victoria.

Triunfa a lo largo de 16 niveles épicos y 15 desafíos emocionantes.

Sumérgete en esta épica aventura de fantasía y transfórmate en el mago que estabas destinado a ser.

nodes.long_description:
Embark on an odyssey of magical proportions where YOU are the beacon of hope! Unleash the raw might of a formidable wizard and feel the exhilarating rush of unparalleled magic cascading through your fingertips. Immerse yourself in a stunning world on the brink of chaos, under the shadow of primal elementals threatening to consume all in their path.

The fate of countless souls rests on your shoulders. As their savior, you are tasked with the monumental mission of delivering the people of these lands from the looming darkness. But fear not, for as you traverse the rich tapestry of forests, mountains, and ethereal planes, you'll unlock the secrets to over 200 mesmerizing spells. From the gentle glow of nature incantations to the roaring inferno of fire magic, you'll find a spell to face every threat of your adventure.

Your mettle will be tested by more than just the elementals. Over 100 formidable adversaries, each with their unique skills and abilities, await your challenge. Confront fearsome bosses that will demand every ounce of your strategic prowess.

Your journey is as much about wits as it is about might. Employ a combination of strategy, timing, and sheer creativity to craft your path to victory, obliterating all who dare stand in your way.

Adventurer, write your chapter in the annals of magic. Dive into this epic journey, for the ultimate magical saga awaits your touch. The question remains: Are you truly prepared to leave your mark?
nodes.short_description: Unleash the might of a powerful wizard and let unparalleled magic surge through your fingertips! Dive deep into a world threatened by primal elementals. Save the people of these lands and master over 200 mesmerizing spells. Tackle 100+ formidable foes and fearsome bosses. Use your creativity and obliterate all who oppose you. Step into an epic journey and create your own legendary tale. Are you prepared for the ultimate magical saga?

nodes.change_log:
Balance changes
Expanded tutorial
Quality of life
Bugfixes

Better pacing challenges
Balance changes
Improved explosions
Easier access items
Improved speed
More fluid combat

Added languages: French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese and Dutch
Quality of Life spell casting
Bug fixes
Smoother spellcasting and enemies
Spells are better tuned
Spells cause extra chaos
